,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L1;5003L1, 218BN, 1219 MY;3; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U12H240 |manuf_rev = T00 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, Tomato (Shibby), FreshTomato-ARM |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 03/26/2013 |estreldate = 06/28/2013 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00EM5UFP4 |asin_country = US |asin2 = B00EM5UFP4 |asin_country2 = GB |countrymanuf = China, Vietnam |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1300 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4331; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{WiFiCert|WFA19988|07/02/2013}} *OEM: [[Foxconn]] ([[Ambit]]) [https://github.com/mirror/dd-wrt/blob/master/src/router/netgear/ambitCfg-r6300v2.h U12H240T00] ==Specifications== The FCC photos for this device show space for a single RAM chip.. :which is a ''Samsung'' K4B1G1646G (128MB) in those photos. The FCC docs also show the device labeled as the [[Netgear AC1450]]. :This device is presumably using a BCM4708 series SoC. The R6300v2 has a single USB 3.0 port and a single USB 2.0 port. ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
J252
(RX)  (TX) (GND) (3.3V)
pin4  pin3  pin2  pin1
{{/Serial info}} ==See also== *[[Netgear R6100]] - AC1200 *[[Netgear R6220]] - AC1200 *[[Netgear R6250]] - AC1600 *[[Netgear R6300 v1]] - AC1750 *Netgear R6300 v2 - AC1750 *[[Netgear R6400 v1]] - AC1750 *[[Netgear R6400 v2]] - AC1750 *[[Netgear R6700]]v1 - AC1750 *[[Netgear R6700v2]] - AC1750 *[[Netgear R6700v3]] - AC1750 *[[Netgear R6800]] - AC1900 *[[Netgear R6900v1]] - AC1900 *[[Netgear R6900v2]] - AC1900 *[[Netgear R6900P]] - AC1900 *[[Netgear R7000]] - AC1900 *[[Netgear R7000P]] - AC2300 *[[Netgear R7450]] - AC2600 [[Category:English Documentation]]
